20110118171350.000|20110118171351.000|CC1|   [ Woman ] I HAD THIS DEEP,   
20110118171351.000|20110118171353.000|CC1|  RADIATING PAIN EVERYWHERE...  
20110118171353.000|20110118171355.000|CC1|   AND I WONDERED WHAT IT WAS.  
20110118171355.000|20110118171355.000|CC1|   I FOUND OUT THAT CONNECTED   
20110118171355.000|20110118171357.000|CC1|   TO OUR MUSCLES ARE NERVES

20110118171359.000|20110118171359.000|CC1|     MY DOCTOR DIAGNOSED IT     
20110118171359.000|20110118171401.000|CC1|        AS FIBROMYALGIA,        
20110118171401.000|20110118171401.000|CC1|    THOUGHT TO BE THE RESULT    
20110118171401.000|20110118171403.000|CC1|      OF OVERACTIVE NERVES      
20110118171403.000|20110118171403.000|CC1|       THAT CAUSE CHRONIC,
